alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 28 at 5:57PM CDT until May 28 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Nebraska, including the following county, Frontier. * WHEN...Until 700 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 556 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional thunderstorms will impact the area over the next hour with additional heavy rainfall. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area and Orafino. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
